OUTLINE : This multicenter study . - Induction therapy : Patients receive clofarabine IV 1 hour day 1-5 temsirolimus IV 30 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 . Treatment continue 1-2 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . - Maintenance therapy : Patients achieve morphologic complete remission ( CR ) CR incomplete blood count recovery receive temsirolimus IV 30 minute day 1 8 month .
